name: conversations.create
desc: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

is_private.desc: Create a private channel instead of a public one.

name.desc: Name of the public or private channel to create.

team_id.desc: encoded team id to create the channel in, required if org token is used.

examples:
{
    "ok": true,
    "channel": {
        "id": "C0EAQDV4Z",
        "name": "endeavor",
        "is_channel": true,
        "is_group": false,
        "is_im": false,
        "created": 1504554479,
        "creator": "U0123456",
        "is_archived": false,
        "is_general": false,
        "unlinked": 0,
        "name_normalized": "endeavor",
        "is_shared": false,
        "is_ext_shared": false,
        "is_org_shared": false,
        "pending_shared": [],
        "is_pending_ext_shared": false,
        "is_member": true,
        "is_private": false,
        "is_mpim": false,
        "last_read": "0000000000.000000",

errors.cannot_create_channel: This channel is unable to be created.
errors.invalid_name_maxlength: Value passed for `name` exceeded max length.
errors.invalid_name_punctuation: Value passed for `name` contained only punctuation.
errors.invalid_name_specials: Value passed for `name` contained unallowed special characters or upper case characters.
errors.missing_scope: The calling token is not granted the necessary scopes to complete this operation.
errors.name_taken: A channel cannot be created with the given name.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from creating channels.
errors.canvas_disabled_user_team: Canvas is disabled on user's team
